descriptionHtml:
[b][b]Updated: Velma v02, Different Brow, Different Eyes, More matured (i think)
[/b]
[color=#ffff00][size=4][u]v01[/u][/size][/color]
[img]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll19/Adam_Syufi_Ikhsanul/Velma%20ECE/ScreenShot58_zpsgx8cpoy2.jpg[/img]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][u]v02[/u][/size][/color]
[img]http://i284.photobucket.com/albums/ll19/Adam_Syufi_Ikhsanul/Velma%20ECE/ScreenShot60_zpsw9cok9fy.jpg[/img]
Velma is my new CMS Save, recreated from my RaceMenu Preset, but turn out to completely different

What is CME?[/b]
it's an extension file from Enhanced Character Edit, which stores the data of character's face as a preset. It's very simple to use, all you need to do is open up showracemenu on any savefile and use the CME preset.

[b]RequirementsRequired Mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]Apachii Hair Female Version[/url] (optional)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrow[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35303//?]Female Facial Animation[/url] (optional)[b]
The Eyes of Beauty: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?
UNPB : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?[/b]

[b]Installation[/b]
The file doesn't go the Skyrim main Directory.
It goes to "My Document -> my games -> Skyrim ->CME_Save"

[b][b]
-- EDITED --

[/b][/b]Here comes my first follower based on this preset [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66226/?]Carissa The Young Eager Female Follower[/url]
author: sanul17
